# dynatrace_iam_user (Data Source)

Fetches the groups the user identified with the given email



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `email` (String)

### Read-Only

- `groups` (List of String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
